original_title: Talking about Food and Other Things
overview: A "short" documentary about people explaining their eating habits in the context of their lives. The film conveys the peculiar way in which we talk about ourselves, delving into the connections between personal life and outside activities, all with the pretext that food has a strong iconic force.
tagline: People explain their eating habits in the context of their kitchens.
title: Talking about Food and Other Things
